tourName: Move to the Music of Cuba: Salsa, Rumba, and Afro-Cuban Rhythms
generalInfo: Embrace the music on this eight-day Cuba tour for an enchanting vacation that introduces you to the rhythms of rumba, the seductions of salsa, and the appealing flow of Afro-Cuban songs.
